short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add Calculator Whiz and easily access a basic, scientific, and financial calculator via a widget on your browser toolbar.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Perform a wide range of calculations with ease using our basic, advanced and financial calculators.
  
How to use the calculator tool
- Add the extension to your Chrome™ browser
- Pin the extension to your browser's toolbar for quick access to the calculator widget
- Use the basic calculator to add, subtract, multiply, or divide
- Solve advanced math problems using the scientific calculator
- Calculate interest payments, monthly installments & more using the financial calculator

We welcome your ideas and suggestions to improve this extension. Please note that you can uninstall the extension if you are dissatisfied with the product.

Upon clicking the button above, you confirm that you have read & agree to the Terms of Service & Privacy Policy and consent to install this Chrome™ extension.

Chrome is a trademark of Google LLC. Use of it here does not imply any affiliation with or endorsement by Google LLC.
